* BrightBlade stood and leaned close to the water's surface, she drank deep 
then looked up. There was nothing here but trees and shrubs, diet and soil.
BrightBlade took a few steps forward then stopped and sat on her haunches, 
where were these Predacons?
She looked up then saw it, speeding towards the plains was a landspeeder! 
Bots sat upon it but they were of no interest to her, none of them looked 
like Gangon's Hell Beast.
BrightBlade sighed then opened her comlink to Gangon...*

" This is BrightBlade to Gangon, come in! About your offer..."
